meanings.definition: A thingamabob is a term used to refer to an object whose name is unknown or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: I found a box full of thingamabobs in the attic.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps a jar of thingamabobs in her kitchen for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out a bunch of thingamabobs from his hat, much to the audience's delight.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of thingamabobs, each memory a different trinket.
meanings.sent5: The room was cluttered with thingamabobs of all shapes and sizes, making it hard to navigate.

meanings.definition: Thingamabobs can also be used as placeholders for any unspecified item or gadget.
meanings.sent1: Please pass me one of those thingamabobs on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: He always carries a pocketful of thingamabobs just in case.
meanings.sent3: The inventor's workshop was filled with strange thingamabobs waiting to be tested.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was like a bottomless pit of thingamabobs, each one serving a different purpose.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led them to a hidden cave filled with mysterious thingamabobs.
